plan.plan_title: Unpermitted Crowd Gathering at KR Market

steps.details: Use OSINT and on-ground police reports to confirm organizers, motives and true crowd size.
Attempt to negotiate with crowd leaders to agree on route and minimize disruption.
Advise public on planned march route and recommend avoidance of KR Market area.
Deploy teams along likely route to manage order and respond to medical needs.
Ready barriers and diversion routes to protect sensitive infrastructure en-route to Vidhana Soudha.

plan.plan_title: March Occupies Sirsi Circle Flyover Approaches

steps.details: BMTC to implement pre-planned diversions and avoid Sirsi Circle to maintain network reliability.
Signal and traffic changes to direct flow to parallel streets to reduce congestion.
Secure hospitals and emergency access routes near the march path.
Use CCTV and aerial assets to monitor crowd pockets and identify risky compression zones.
Keep an open line with protest leaders to manage pace and prevent sudden surges.
Police to use minimum force and negotiation teams to de-escalate scuffles and avoid crowd panic.
Provide immediate medical attention and ensure legal processing for arrests with documentation.
Reinforce protective measures around Vidhana Soudha and restrict unauthorized access.
Provide factual updates to prevent rumor spread and advise public to avoid the area.
Assess permit processes and rapid-response protocols to improve handling of future unannounced gatherings.
